As the new semester begins, fourth-year college
students are faced with a big mission: the thesis
project. It's not just about going to classes anymore
there's a major task on the horizon. Picking the right
teammates is super important for making this project a
success. Think of it like building a dream team. Now,
picture you need four teammates, including yourself,
each bringing something special in IT. Who would you
choose to make sure your thesis project is fantastic
and covers all the important parts?
Alex leads coding for top-notch technical aspects.
Jordan assists Alex in programming, maintaining a strong team.
Sam has limited skills and motivation but is a close friend.
Taylor excels in documenting for future reference.
Casey ensures seamless project network connectivity.
Alex leads coding for top-notch technical aspects.
Great! Now you have team mates.
Now that you have teammate there were problems as
expected during the thesis/capstone. Which of your
team mates can help you resolve such issues.

Wow, you're awesome! You got a perfect score in your
exam. This is your last/bonus question.
Well done! Now you are on the stage where you have to
choose an on-the-job training opportunity for your
Player's Decision: As the player, you need to decide
which OJT opportunity aligns best with your career
Do you want to deepen your skills in a specific niche,
explore different areas, or work in a dynamic startup
environment? The choice is yours! Several companies
Best Fit if: You are interested in specializing in
cybersecurity and want to focus on developing secure
Data Science Lab: Best Fit if: You are intrigued by
data analysis and machine learning, and want to
apply your programming skills in a research-oriented
What ever their decision may be, these are all inclined
with the programming skillset that player has.
As we know IT is very flexible so good luck to you.
And you have successfully graduated from the
